definitions.definition: To send a text message to; i.e. to transmit text using the Short Message Service ( SMS ), or a similar service, between communications devices, particularly mobile phones .
examples: Just text me when you get here.
I'll text the address to you as soon as I find it.

definitions.definition: To send and receive text messages .
examples: Have you been texting all afternoon?

definitions.definition: To write in large characters , as in text hand .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To send a text message to; i.e. to transmit text using the Short Message Service ( SMS ), or a similar service, between communications devices, particularly mobile phones .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To send and receive text messages .
( dated ) To write in large characters , as in text hand .
